message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at a special introductory price of $14,500. This is a limited-time offer, so I hope you'll consider taking advantage of it.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the introductory price, but I'm looking to pay closer to $13,000.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. I am willing to negotiate further and offer the product at $13,750. This is my final offer before considering other potential buyers.
